description.value:
This tiny cylinder contains specialized nanites that either

  • Remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} condition
  • Decrease the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 1.
  • Attempt a counteract check against one poison or disease afflicting the target. Use your @Check[medicine] modifier for the counteract modifier and a counteract rank of 6.
  • Attempt a flat check to end persistent poison or bleed damage. As this is particularly effective assistance, the DC of the flat check is reduced from 15 to 10 for this check.
  • Allow you to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 minute. You can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

  • Grant you fast healing 10 for 1 minute. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} condition, decrease its value by 1 instead of gaining fast healing.

    @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.equipment-effects.Item.NqP5f6IChp8XNCrJ]{Effect: Hypopen (Quickened or Fast Healing)}
